main.name: ARUN KUMAR REDDY
main.description: I'm a freelance Full stack developer based in Glasgow, United Kindom. I have over 10 years of experience in the web design industry. I'm specialized in UI design. You can check out my work below
main.bio: I am a highly competent IT professional with a proven track record in designing websites, networking and managing databases. I have strong technical skills as well as excellent interpersonal skills, enabling me to interact with a wide range of clients. I am eager to be challenged in order to grow and further improve my IT skills. My greatest passion is in life is using my technical know-how to benefit other people and organisations.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: This college taught me everything. I used to involve in general discussion, labs and particared in various sports activities. Here, I met many intellectual/different people and studied how to think differently. This college changed my lifestyle
I have improved my mathematical and logical skills.
Memorable and unforgettable jouney which will be remembered all my life.

work.title: Senior Software Developer
work.description: Working on interesting and challenging project. Working on niche technology Qlik Sense with react/redux framework. It's a dashboard application where we can analysize the people overall performance, standards, commits in our firm in timely manner.

work.title: Senior Web Developer
work.description: I joined as fresher just after finishing my graduation. During my tenure, I have worked with different people, clients and projects. This Company thought me how to work, how to behave more importantly how to live.

projects.title: Test

testimonials.text: Arun is amazing! Very friendly guy and his level of professionalism is top-notch.
I totally recommend Arun! He is fast, efficient and the communication was great.
Arun really gave 100% to help me with my project. I'm very happy with the end result!
